summary: This is a joint letter submitted by the parties in the case United States v. Maxwell regarding prospective juror questionnaires. It appears to be a procedural filing in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal trial.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case United States v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330, which is the subject of the joint letter regarding juror questionnaires.

events.title: Submission of Joint Letter on Juror Questionnaires
events.description: The parties in United States v. Maxwell submitted a joint letter to the court regarding prospective juror questionnaires.

keyFacts: The document is a joint letter from the parties in the criminal case United States v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330.
The letter concerns prospective juror questionnaires, indicating the trial is in or approaching the jury selection phase.
The letter was submitted on or about November 13-14, 2021.
The filing originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
